law.text: It is declared to be in the interest of the public welfare that Kentucky farmers who are producers of bovine animals shall be permitted and encouraged to act jointly and in cooperation with all producers, handlers, dealers, and processors of bovine animals in promoting and stimulating, by research, market development, and education, the use and sale, domestic and foreign, of bovine animal products.
law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 3, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 1.
